Good Comments: Quite a bunch of typos and mistakes, for example "Non" -> "Nono". Lots of eye-candy, but this release fails because of all the mistakes.
To the idiot who negatived this because of "non" being a typo, its actually her nickname if you listen to the audio "Non-chan", its not a typo its what they call her occasionally.
Bad Comments: Accurate translation and easy to read font. Good job
Fantastic translation, great TS and Kara, thank god that you guys did it; I couldn't stand the other group.
